title: WALK TO RETAIL AND DINING, BUILT IN MICROWAVE, 24 HOUR FITNESS CENTER
posting_body: Alexander at the District has set the new standard for luxury living in West Midtown Atlanta, GA.

Each of our spectacular one and two bedroom Westside Atlanta apartments feature stainless steel appliances in a contemporary kitchen, and beautiful Midtown West Atlanta skyline views right from your luxury home.
Residents of our Westside community enjoy spacious homes with custom lighting, 10-foot ceilings with crown molding, and a full-size washer and dryer.
BILLIARD AND GAME ROOM WITH WIFI ACCESS AND TV SEATING AREA
CEILING FANS IN LIVING ROOM AND BEDROOM
CLUBHOUSE WITH FULL KITCHEN AND COFFEE BAR
FULL SIZE WASHER AND DRYER IN EVERY HOME
A RANGE OF SPACIOUS ONE AND TWO BEDROOM FLOOR PLANS
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
